Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Consider a mechanism to control how parts are loaded" (#1294) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
There are a number of things that occur when a package/part is loaded. As time has gone on, we have added some special casing for things, and it is clear that some control would be helpful here for a developer to have access to.

Proposal:

- Add a feature that would allow for customizing loading of parts
- Currently, the loading occurs before we have a chance to modify features, so we would have to have a way to intercept that as well.
